Articles.Content:
Really driving me crazy, no matter how big or small i make it i always seem to have around 4k delta v at LKO so i think i'll be fine. taking off from duna i feel like i waste SO much fuel orbiting and by the time i get a kerbin encounter im literally always just barely short and it's getting to me. im pretty sure it could be how im initially orbiting kerbin, like i must be shedding a lot of delta v during that process but i've been at this for like 4 days straight and daaaaang

Edited July 16, 2019 by Reinhart Mk.1

I actually have a plane ready to go  It seems like it can make it to LKO with around 3k dv, I looked at what encounter I could make with Duna and I lined one up for 1k DV so that leaves around 2. I’m liking my chances. 

You should make a badge for you challenge >_<!

19 hours ago, Dale Christopher said:

I actually have a plane ready to go  It seems like it can make it to LKO with around 3k dv, I looked at what encounter I could make with Duna and I lined one up for 1k DV so that leaves around 2. I’m liking my chances. 

You should make a badge for you challenge >_<!

that's awesome! i think the ascents for both are the hardest parts really, like i said i think one of them isn't too efficient cause i seem to always be lacking. and i would but im terrible with that stuff
